name: Stranger in This Reality
text:
You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose:
Exhaust Clarice Ferguson → remove Stranger in This Reality from the game.
Discard each [[portal]] upgrade from play. If no [[portal]] upgrade was discarded this way, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

name: Timebroker
text: Timebroker cannot take damage. [star] Forced Response: After Timebroker activates, place 2 threat on the Damaged Reality side scheme. Forced Response: After Timebroker enters play, find the Damaged Reality side scheme and reveal it. (Blink's nemesis minion.)

name: Damaged Reality
text: Timebreakers had accidentally damaged many realities across the Multiverse and tricked heroes into fixing their mistake. When Revealed: Place 1 additional threat here for each upgrade in play. Then, discard an upgrade you control. When Defeated: Discard Timebroker. [crisis] [star] Boost: Reveal this card.

name: Timebreakers
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for Timebroker and reveal him. (Shuffle.) If Timebroker does not enter play this way, this card gains surge. "Must we really sacrifice a reality just to teach them a lesson?" —Timebreakers
